synopsis.text:
Jay's and Osamu's mundane lives as cereal salesmen take a dramatic turn when they stumble upon an otherworldly secret one fateful night. Mysterious capsules carrying vampiric beings have crashed in the western mountains, unleashing creatures previously known only in folklore and myths. Among these supernatural entities is Kimera, a captivating hermaphrodite with striking gold and crimson eyes.

When Osamu and Kimera's eyes meet, it's an instant connection, and Osamu becomes hell-bent on liberating Kimera from the clutches of scientific research. Little does he know, Kimera is the key to the survival of these vampiric beings, who are waging war against humanity and each other to perpetuate their species.

As the military struggles to contain these terrifying creatures, Osamu's obsession with Kimera only intensifies. With the help of Jay and his father, a top researcher at a government lab, Osamu embarks on a dangerous journey to free Kimera. However, the stakes are higher than they realize, as the fate of humanity hangs in the balance. Will Osamu's love for Kimera lead to humanity's salvation or its ultimate doom? Only time will tell in this thrilling tale of love, loyalty, and survival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
